title: Anodic peroxide production for advanced oxidation processes with different metal oxide electrodes in carbonate electrolytes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00176A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tobias Schanz, Jonathan Z. Bloh
Anodic electrochemical peroxide generation is promising for AOP applications. This study evaluates the electrochemical efficiency and oxidizing power of the resulting peroxide mixtures, depending on the electrolyte composition.
